players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I've identified Diana as the mafioso. I'll be watching her closely."
Diana: "Be careful, Charlie. Your accusation might be based on suspicion rather than evidence."
You: "I'm still trying to figure out who the mafioso is. I'll keep an eye on Diana and Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
